 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁל‎</span> in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְַהַֿשַּׁל‎</span> [[2Sam.6.7|2Sam 6:7]] is disputed; [[BDB#B|ᵐ5]]<sup>B</sup> omitted; [[BDB#A|A]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">τῇ προπετείᾳ</span>, ***for his hastiness*** (probably from Aramaic; compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = ***suddenly***), [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***temeritate***; Targun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על דאשתלי‎</span> because he ***acted in error*** (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁלִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלָא‎</span> ***err:*** see Biblical Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁלוּ‎</span>), hence [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] ***for his error***; &lt; [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] fragm. of [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח יָדוֺ עַל‎</span>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַ‎</span> [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר‎</span>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>, \|\| [[1Chr.13.10|1Chr 13:10]].
